EmailTemplate.name: International Order Status
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for reaching out to YETI. Use this link https://tracking.borderfree.com/ to track your international order.
Thanks,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
